name: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
description: A healthy and delicious alternative to traditional mashed potatoes made with cream.
preparation: Boil potatoes Approximately 20 minutes, or until tender. Drain in removable colander, and return to pot. Cover, and set aside.
Heat milk with Herb & Garlic Dip Mix in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup.
Mash or whip potatoes until lump-free. Add milk mixture and remaining ingredients, stirring until smooth.
tips: For a twist, try Epicure Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix instead of Herb & Garlic Dip Mix.
